Name: theViewer
About the game: There is no Better Way to Create VR Tours than theViewer. No matter if you are an architect or an amateur photographer, with theViewer you can create VR tours from 360 images in minutes and immediately view them via Android, iOS, GearVR and even Oculus Rift apps. Check out theViewer to find out more about special features like : - magic links - shared experience - embedded VR and many more Important - In order to get access to all features of the app you have to register at theViewer.co/order first
Meta Title: theViewer: Feb 7, 2019, theConstructVR and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on theViewer? Check out the release date (Feb 7, 2019), developer insights from theConstructVR, and a complete game summary.
